function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Use of threshold for classification based on iou","category":"Modeling and simulation risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"False positive predictions due to iou threshold","category":"Modeling and prediction risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate object detection leading to incorrect measurements","category":"Modeling and prediction
